title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not charging
author: kayzee
content: Product is not charging at all - right out of the box. Played a few minutes before dying. Sound quality good for the brief minutes it played. Sent to Altec under warranty within a day or so of delivery. Waited 2 weeks. After Altec returned to me, it charged the first time. Used for 2 hours. Tried to charge it again, but wouldn't charge. Maybe my luck with Altec Lansing products. I probably wouldn't buy Altec Lansing again.This is the second straight Lansing product I bought with technical issues. A compact speaker,Model IMW1100 worked for just few weeks then stopped charging. I returned to Amazon and bought another one (same IMW 1100). The replacement charges but the illuminating lighting system does not work. I got tired of returning to Amazon and just kept it. I hope someone in the delivery chain is not purposely selling defective Altec Lansing items.

title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loud bang for the Buck!
author: R-N
content: Great bargain for what all that you get- portability, long battery charge, volume, and sound quality. Even has different light modes, but for me, that is a useless gimmick. But for a party, may be a welcome gimmick.I've used this the last few months outside while working in the yard, and indoors- gym and while working in my basement. Cranked up, the sound fills my large yard and maintains sound quality, especially for a portable speaker. And no worries if it starts to rain, won't be affected. Nonetheless, I haven't attempted to test its full water resistant potential by dunking it in a pool or directing a hose on it (why?).In the house, at a "normal" volume, the battery last hours/days. So far, I have gone a few days of listening for a couple hours each without plugging it in. Also, it easily connects via bluetooth to my iPhone and keeps that connection for a range of 50ft plus. When I use it in the yard, I either leave my phone near the speaker, or I use my iPad or old phone to connect with Spotify or Apple Music so as not to be restricted to the limitations of Bluetooth range.

title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good but,
author: John
content: I bought this to replace a "G Boom" that the speaker went bad in.I had checked out the previous version at a local retail store and liked the sound quality and functionality.It was around the same price. I watched the video on Amazon and the review seemed accurate, although the speakers on an iPad are only so good...I purchased from Amazon and it arrived promptly.I charged it fully and linked it to my phone. It took a moment to link, but was fine. Using the controls for the audio on my phone, I proceeded to run it through it's paces.Volume is good although there is no adjustment on the speaker itself, nor any type of adjustment for sound in anyway.The lights are cool but not necessarily something I cared about either way.Battery life is great. I use it daily for 6 to 8 hours and only charge it once a week.Having a dedicated bass speaker, I expected a better bass sound. At full volume, it's good but not great.For me, it's a ok speaker at the price.Would be a great buy at $100 but no more.If you want sound and flashing lights, could be for you...great sound quality, there are better choices for the price.

title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Definitely what I was looking for!!
author: Dustin Queen
content: I read the reviews I also have a coworker that has one at work it's a wet environment! It's held up well!!I run this on my ATV I did buy the warranty tho just bc I ride in the rain and mud!I did add some clear silicon on the seams of the box and where the cord plugs into I do cover it up with gorilla tape!!It's loud the lights are obnoxiously bright!And rode through a 3 hour downpour and the thing never skipped a beat! If you use the light and blare the music non stop your lucky to get 5 hours of play time on it. Without the lights a solid 7-8 hours on high!Update: 4/6/2024This speaker has been pretty amazing tbh it it still loud and the charge has went down over constant use, however I modified a cord to be able to charge it as I ride for more than 6hr long trips.. now it‚Äôs not completely watertight. The plug in area if it gets wet it won‚Äôt charge you‚Äôll have to let it dry out really good. The one thing I‚Äôve done is just seal that area up with ductape I know kinda lame but overall great speaker with some modifications lol. Also had this in my kayak when I tipped over I didn‚Äôt test the floating capability 100% knowing it‚Äôs not fully sealed tight.
timestamp: Reviewed in the United States June 12, 2023

title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Like my old school boombox on steroids
author: The OG Elf
content: The media could not be loaded. DANG, this is like my old school boombox on steroids. I got it for a houseparty we were throwing for my daughter's 21st birthday. I seriously felt like I was back in college. The sound on this thing is BEYOND!! The front facing woofers give you that heart thumping, rumbling sound and great quality bass. The sound is crisp and super clear with no distortion. Along with rocking sound quality, it's got 4 different LED lighting modes. You can set it to a slow fade, multi-color slow fade, solid blue or it'll beat to music. I wish I would've gotten a video at the party, but we were having too much fun and I forgot. It charges very quickly and you can get around 20 hours of playtime. That's insane!! You can charge it with the normal wall charger that it comes with or use the USB charging port to connect to a USB power source, like a power bank, laptop or wall outlet. You can also charge your phone with it while using the speaker. It'll connect to any bluetooth enabled device and has a 100 foot range. It's easy to pair and after the first time it will automatically connect to your device when you turn the speaker on. It's crazy, but you can connect up to 50 House Party enabled speakers at the same time. WHAT?!?! That'd be like your own concert. The functionality and options are amazing. It's even waterproof, so I can use it in my pool. That's going to be amazeballs this summer!! If you want a powerful, high quality speaker with sound that'll knock your socks off, stop looking and buy this speaker. I'm sure you'll love it as much as I do!!
timestamp: Reviewed in the United States April 4, 2021

After 14 hours on charge the light was still red so i was able to turn it on and try it out and it does sound pretty awesome! BUT.. for the price i want a speaker that charges and holds a charge. I called the company per the instructions and did not return to amazon as I would have to pay more to replace the speaker as it's not on sale anymore and I have to send it back to the company WHENEVER they send me my prepaid label and from there they will test it themselves and should ship a new speaker out within 15 days after that... MY WEDDING IS IN 39 DAYS!!! The whole purpose of buying this speaker was FOR MY WEDDING! as far as the speaker sound... 5 STAR.. as far as dealing with the company and trying to get my speaker relaced ASAP .. 0 star.

content: The media could not be loaded. TLDR: after 4 years, It's worth $200.Longer story: I listen to normal music and offer it up to dispensaries I work at as a lobby speaker. title: 3.0 out of 5 stars LED's dont work correctly.
author: guitarchad
content: I normally don't take the time to review, but to save someone else the hassle, I am taking the time.This Stereo SOUNDS AMAZING.The annoying and most frustrating part is probably not a big deal to some. But for me, this was the bad.The LED's that are supposed to give you a 'cool' atmosphere were defective on TWO of the units I tried. I went through Amazon's return process and received an identical unit with the exact same issue.When for instance cycling through colors, and setting it to BLUE, or RED; all of the LED's are supposed to be the same color.On both of the units I tried out, there was always ONE LED that was the wrong color. This may not seem to be a big deal, but when you set it to a specific color, and only ONE LED is a different color, it looks dumb. I contacted the manufacturer and was told it was most likely a manufacturing error. This is a shame, because honestly it sounded great. But my OCD couldn't handle there always being one LED out of sync with the others. Even setting it to multiple colors, it just looked off. I have returned my second one, and will be waiting a while before trying again. Hopefully others don't have the issue that I did, but if this would bug you, as it did me, I would wait and allow them to sort the problem out at the manufacturing level.

title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Were the reviews fake, or is my product defective?
author: Isiah E.
content: I purchased the speaker in May of this year; hoping that I would not have to purchase another speaker for years to come. I'll be honest, this was definitely not worth the money and I'll explain why. The sound quality itself is lackluster. The audio clarity is just horrendous. I compared the audio clarity to that of my Amazon echo studio which I have as part of my home theater setup and the echo studio is far clearer. The speaker also isn't very loud unless you're in a rather small space with barely any people. This speaker wasn't bad for the game nights I hosted at my apartment but lord knows this thing is terrible outside, especially if someone else is also playing music on their own speakers. The battery life of this thing is severely disappointing. I might have only used this speaker a handfull of times since purchasing it, and I generally don't use it for more than 3 hours at a time but I put this speaker to the test on June 3rd as I did a cookout. The speaker with the lights on, only lasted AT MOST 5 hours! This speaker was fully charged before I used it, I even put it on the charger from the night before and only took it off directly before leaving to cook out. The lights were on, the volume was on max, and this fully charged speaker died literally within 5 hours! I'm not sure if the lights plus max volume severely drained the battery or what. I also don't like the fact that you cannot play music while a microphone is plugged in as it will disconnect your Bluetooth. Even with the mic plugged in, the sound from the mic is so low on this speaker that you barely hear it! There is no problem with the mic as I've tested it on other devices, the problem was the speaker. Overall this was a really bad purchase on my end. I bought this because of all of the positive reviews, and while I still respect others opinion on this product, I did not have a good experience with this product. Please beware that if you have or have had pretty good speakers in the past then this one will be nothing special.
timestamp: Reviewed in the United States July 4, 2022

title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Third time is a charm...
author: SpyderED
content: The first two orders of this box had defective lights. I was impressed with the sound quality, the built quality and the design. Perfect for my requirements. However, one of the lights were off or not in sync with the others so I just got so frustrated and returned the first two items back. I still did not gave up and took a third time to re-order the item. The seller just replaced them both. I did tested again the third one and I was so happy that I finally got a good working lights. I will update my review for this item as time progress. Highly recommended for a simple sound listening but not to a big party. You probably need to get a couple more and link them together to have a louder sound in you party.

title: 1.0 out of 5 stars App is awful‚Ä¶

content: The speaker did not work right even after a hard reset. After the initial connection, it would not reconnect to my phone no matter what I tried. Also, the app is terrible‚Ä¶ you can‚Äôt see the battery life, there is no way to change the lighting at will, and the control panel would not appear a second time after that first connection failure. title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Definitely not for floating in water
author: Allison Kring
content: This box is decent for the sound quality; the lights are cool, HOWEVER, if you plan on floating it in water, it will float, but water will get into the "water tight sealed" cap for the USB/charger port. After a few minutes of floating the box will stop playing. You then need to make sure all the water gets out, and leave it to dry out for up to a week before it will play music clearly again. the first couple of days after floating it, it will not play at all, then slowly gets better over the next few days as it plays muffled & grainy. They manufactured this with a poorly engineered "water tight" cap that is easy to put on, but hard to remove, and doesnt keep water out anyway. Not sure why they didnt engineer a tighter cap with that could screw on with a sealed o-ring, it would be a simple fix and could make it a good floating box, but there you are. Also the device I received is definitely not a fluke or onece off defect. This is a replacement; I returned the first one thinking it may have been defective due to this, but the replacement has the same trouble
timestamp: Reviewed in the United States September 16, 2022

title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Sound Stage Depth/Clarity
author: Tom
content: For a $200 or under bluetooth speaker, this RockBox XL has great sound quality due to the ferrite speakers used. I have a higher watt rating bluetooth speaker that can get louder than the RockBox but the speaker quality of the RockBox sounds way better than the other one from AOMAIS. RockBox can get still really loud if you push it to the max volume without having the sound quality wash out since the ferrite speakers can be pushed harder than alot of bluetooth speakers. I am thinking of buying a second one since you can link up to 50 of them together just to see how 2 work together to really be adequate for being a portable party sound system.My only knock on it are the powering on sound is kinda dumb, but that's super minor.
timestamp: Reviewed in the United States July 15, 2021

title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great if you do want to put it in a pool; overpriced if you don't.
author: Josh
content: I was pretty disappointed for the price. No separate volume control or equalizer except for whatever you're doing to the signal directly from your phone/player. The plastic handle feels like it might break and I have to be careful with it. The bootup sound "Welcome to Altec Lansing" speech is annoying instead of just a beep or something. The sound isn't particularly great, nor is the volume. If you will actually use the waterproof features and take it the beach, it's probably great for you, otherwise way overpriced.

title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Could be a lemon?
author: Andrew H.
content: One of the color modes for the lights does not work after attempting multiple times. I purchased Altec Lansing over others because I have a friend who has had theirs for years with no issues whatsoever, he's had it in the sand at the beach multiple times and swears by this product. I just wanted to bring the issue to your attention as maybe it is a manufacturing defect.Upon having more time with the product, I have noticed when plugged in the power button is not lit up red, so it is not charging and at only 90% charge . Keep in mind this is directly taken from the box. I think I received a dud product.Furthermore I attempted to send an email to support@alteclansing.com and was returned an email immediately saying my email was rejected and unapproved.
